page.title: 14CLYST HONITON VILLAGE.
page.content:
{Clyst Honiton }
Clyst Honiton is a very small village. There is a main road splitting the village into two parts.The other part is a lane called Blackhorse Lane.The school is one of the main features of the village,sited in the middle.Next to the school there is a Church Hall. The church which is opposite the school is 700 years old and it is the oldest building in the village.Next to the church there is a house called Clyst House. It takes up a large area of land.Alongside the A30 there are two pubs and a post office.The post office sells sweets,cards,etc,and includes a sorting office which serves five villages around Clyst Honiton.
